[bq="ArcticEight"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55739b8563687256ef002010#post_55739b8563687256ef002010
That is stupid.[/bq]
The video game argument we've had I'm fine with.  All those arguments and that I'm totally fine with.  Me and Squiggy argue all the fucking time about anime and manga and we're still buddies.  The reason why I hate Thanotos is that he legitimately believes that having sexual preferences towards what you consider sexy facial structure wise makes you racist.


Personally I think asians and hispanic women to be sexiest cause the area I live in is primarily caucasian and african american so I prefer sexuality wise facial structures I don't see every day.
